title: Pupil Labs
s2: for eye tracking and egocentric vision research
pupil_description_1: Pupil is an open source mobile eye tracking platform, in active community driven development.
pupil_description_2: It is used by academic and commercial research labs all around the world for research in a wide range of fields including: psychology, cognitive sciences, UX design, and marketing.
pupil_description_3: Hardware is accessible, modular, and affordable. Software is open source and supported on Linux, MacOS, and Windows.
about_description_1: At Pupil Labs we strive to make great tools.
about_description_2: We are a small team with diverse backgrounds.
about_description_3: We do research, design, development, and fabrication.
about_description_4: We believe in open source. We work closely with our community to continuously improve the tools we build.
